p_64: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).

p_102: Aloha! We are the only radiology residency program in the state of Hawaii. Work and learn alongside military members and DHA civilians at the largest military medical treatment facility in the Pacific. Candidates must be US citizens because civilian applicants become federal employees of the US Veterans Administration.
